title: ARAM Tournaments
body:
Hey guys,
I wanted to start playing some Aram tournaments on battlefy and since its pretty boring to play
with randoms in tournaments all the time I wanted to create a small community where u can just
post upcoming tournaments and hook up with some people to create a full team. I guess
the league club system is the easiest way to communicate with each other so if u are interested in
some "competitive aram" feel free to add me "Tiggi66"
Greetings Philipp
